bug.summary: V2 Preview - Quick Square fuction not in V2
bug.description: In previous versions there was a function where you could scroll and create a square around the desired region. you could then adjust the size of the square by pressing ctrl and scrolling. This was very useful.

comments.comment: Thanks for the feedback <denchmark-link:https://github.com/JCAAUSFRA>@JCAAUSFRA</denchmark-link> - by the end of our v2 development cycle we plan to achieve parity with the most used/wanted features that currently exist in v1
This feature will be complete with our Preview 3 release.
